Question: This person won the 1992 presidential election (43.0 percent of the vote) against Republican incumbent George H W.
Hints: While campaigning for U.S President, the then Governor **** returned to Arkansas to see that Ricky Ray Rector would be executed.
This person joined friend Bruce Lindsey's Little Rock law firm of Wright, Lindsey and Jennings.
In 1993, this person was selected as Time's "Man of the Year", and again in 1998, along with Ken Starr.
